item.title: Red-Teaming in the Public Interest
item.description: This report offers a vision for red-teaming in the public interest: a process that goes beyond system-centric testing of already built systems to consider the full range of ways the public can be involved in evaluating genAI harms.
item.content:encoded:
Abstract

This report offers a vision for red-teaming in the public interest: a process that goes beyond system-centric testing of already built systems to consider the full range of ways the public can be involved in evaluating genAI harms.

Details

  • Year: 2025

Links

PDF
